property.name: Text
property.value: Until end of turn -> Each [B] either player flips during a battle is a [O] instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: One of your characters gets +2 [ATK] until end of turn. If it has a Weapon, instead it gets +4 [ATK] until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Do 1 damage to one of your characters -> Do 2 damage to an enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal -> When one of your characters defends and you flip battle cards. When Revealed -> The defender gets +1 [DEF] until end of battle for each [K] you flipped.

property.name: Text
property.value: While the upgraded character is in alt mode -> It has Tough 1. While the upgraded character is in bot mode -> It has Bold 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Name an Action. Then look at your opponent's hand and each face-down enemy Secret Action. Your opponent scraps each card from among them with that name.

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character battles -> Scrap this card after the battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character defends -> You may scrap this card. If you do, the upgraded character gets +2 [DEF] until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Scrap any Weapon or Armor -> Its owner draws a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you put this on a Decepticon -> Your opponent reveals their hand, chooses an Autobot card from it, and scraps that card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character defends -> Scrap this card after the battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you put this on an Autobot -> Repair 1 damage from it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal -> When one of your characters defends. When Revealed -> Each [O] either play flips this battle is a [B] instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: While the upgraded character is attacking an Autobot -> The upgraded character has +1 [ATK]. While the upgraded character is attacking an Autobot Leader -> The upgraded character has Pierce 3.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you deploy the upgraded character's head -> Put this and any other Upgrades that were on the upgraded character onto the deployed character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Pierce 3. When the upgraded character attacks -> Scrap this card after the battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this only to replace an Armor on a character that has no empty Armor slots. If an opponent's card would cause this to be scrapped from a character -> You may scrap an Armor from your hand instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose one of your characters. When it attacks this turn and doesn't have a Weapon -> It gets +3 [ATK] until end of battle, and you scrap all the defender's Weapons.

property.name: Text
property.value: Tap one of your characters in body mode -> Tap an enemy that has 10 Stars or fewer and is in bot mode or body mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose 2 of your characters. If they share a trait, repair 1 damage from each of them.

property.name: Text
property.value: Flip one of your characters from bot mode to alt mode -> Move 1 damage counter from it to an enemy in alt mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal -> When one of your characters defends. When Revealed -> Repair 1 damage from the defender. It can't take more attack damage this battle than the number of Stars the attacker has.

property.name: Text
property.value: The upgraded character can't take non-attack damage from your opponent's cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal -> When one of your characters defends. When Revealed -> The defender gets Tough 4 until end of battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character attacks -> You may scrap this card. If you do, the upgraded character gets +3 [ATK] until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal -> If an opponent's card would cause you to scrap one or more cards from your hand during their turn. When Revealed -> Instead draw 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you put this or another Upgrade on the upgraded character -> It gets +2 [ATK] until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: One of your characters gets +5 [ATK] until end of turn. KO it at end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: One of your characters gets Bold 4 until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal -> If an opponent's card would cause exactly one of their characters to untap. When Revealed -> Instead untap one of your characters that has the same number of Stars or fewer.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal -> If one of your characters defends and would take an odd amount of attack damage. When Revealed -> Instead that character takes no attack damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Do 1 damage to EACH character. Do 1 damage to EACH Autobot.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose one of your characters. When it attacks this turn and you flip battle cards -> It gets +1 [ATK] until end of battle for each different color among battle icons you flipped.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this only to replace a Weapon on a character that has no empty Weapon slots. If an opponent's card would cause this to be scrapped from a character -> You may scrap a Weapon from your hand instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Draw a card for each character you have on the battlefield in bot mode or body mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character attacks and has 3 [ATK] or less -> Untap it and scrap this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal -> When your opponent plays an [W] Action. When Revealed -> Scrap that Action and it has no effect.

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character attacks -> Choose a battle icon color. Then your opponent reveals the top card of their deck. If it has a battle icon of the chosen color, the upgraded character gets a +4 [ATK] until end of battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character attacks and you flip battle cards -> If you flipped at least [W][W][W][W], scrap this card. If you didn't, the upgraded character gets +1 [ATK] until end of turn for each [W] you flipped.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose a mode. Do 1 damage to EACH character in that mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal -> If exactly one of your characters would take non-attack damage from an opponent's card. When Revealed -> Instead do that much non-attack damage to an enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character attacks -> Move 1 damage counter from it to this. Then, if this has 2 or more damage counters, scrap it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put only on Trucks, Tanks, Wreckers, or Constructicons. When the upgraded character is KO'd -> Draw 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Do 1 damage to any character -> Its owner draws 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play a [G] card -> The upgraded character gets +1 [ATK] until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal -> When your opponent plays an Action and it's the second Action they played this turn. When Revealed -> Scrap that Action and it has no effect. Your opponent can't play Actions this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Enemies can't use Brave or Stealth against the upgraded character.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may play a Secret Action. While that card is face down, this card and that card aren't scrapped at the end of turns.

property.name: Text
property.value: While the upgraded character has 16 Stars or more -> It has Bold 1 and Tough 1

property.name: Text
property.value: One of your characters gets +1 [ATK] until end of turn. It can attack untapped characters this turn as though they were tapped.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal -> When one of your character defends. When Revealed -> Each player can't flip more than 2 battle cards during this battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Focus 1. When you put this on a character -> You may play another Triangulator. Up to 3 Triangulators can fit in 1 Utility slot.

property.name: Text
property.value: Do 1 damage to an enemy. If it has 5 Stars of fewer, tap it.

property.name: Text
property.value: While the upgraded character is defending against a Decepticon -> The upgraded character has +1 [DEF]. While the upgraded character is defending against a Decepticon Leader -> Reduce that Leader's Pierce total by 3.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose an equal number of Autobots and Decepticons. For each of those Autobots, move 1 damage counter from it to one of the Decepticons that you haven't moved a counter to this way.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose one of your characters. When it attacks for the first time this turn and you flip at least one battle icon -> Repair 1 damage from it for each different color among battle icons you flipped.

property.name: Text
property.value: While your Tracks, Autobot Warrior is in alt mode -> He has the Plane trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per game, when your Windcharger, Autobot Warrior attacks and is your only character on the battlefield -> He gets +3 until end of battle. Flip this.

card.name: Better Things To Do Than Die

property.name: Text
property.value: When your Springer, Aerial Defense is on the battlefield and you flip him to another mode -> Repair 1 damage from him.

property.name: Text
property.value: When one of your Motorcycles attacks while you have Chromia, Special Ops on the battlefield and you flip at least [W][W] -> That Motorcycle gets +2 [ATK] until end of battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your Windblade, Combiner Hunter has +1 [DEF] and +1 [HEALTH].

property.name: Text
property.value: While you have Crankcase, Data Collector on the battlefield -> Your opponent's card can't cause you to scrap cards from your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: As long as one of your characters other than Optimus Prime, Legendary Warrior has been KO'd this game -> Your Optimus Prime, Legendary Warrior has Brave, Focus 1, Bold 1, and Tough 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: If your starting team is only Autobots -> Your deck can have up to 2 extra Stars of [B] cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per game, when you flip your Decepticon Pounce, Infiltrator to alt mode -> You may play up to 2 Secret Actions. If you do, flip this.

property.name: Text
property.value: When your Volcanicus, Fiery Champion attacks an enemy that has fewer Stars than him -> Your Volcanicus gets Bold until end of battle equal to the Star difference.

property.name: Text
property.value: While your Blitzwing, Relentless Foe is in either alt mode -> He has the Tank and Plane traits.

property.name: Text
property.value: While your Clobber is in head mode -> The character he's on has the Dinobot trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: When your Bludgeon, Electric Warrior attacks and you don't flip a battle card that has more than 1 battle icon -> Put one of the cards you flipped into your hand after the battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per game, when one of your Weaponizers in Upgrade mode is put into your KO area -> Return it to the battlefield upgrading one of your characters. Flip this.

property.name: Text
property.value: Replace the text '12 Stars or fewer' on your Autobot Cosmos, Recon and Communication with '21 Stars or fewer.'

property.name: Text
property.value: When one of your Helicopters attacks and you have Autobot Whirl, Aerial Assault on the battledfield -> Plan 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: When your Brawn, Demolitions defends -> He gets +1 [DEF] until end of battle equal to the attacker's Bold total.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your Megatron, Fallen Hero has Bold based on how many damage counters he has: 1-5 -> Bold 1, 6-10 -> Bold 2, 11+ -> Bold 3

property.name: Text
property.value: While you have Autobot Gears, Transport and Reconnaissance on the battlefield -> Enemies being upgraded can't cause abilities of your opponent's cards to trigger.

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per game, when you flip your Windsweeper, Air Defense to alt mode and he has a number of damage counters equal to or greater than the number of enemies on the battlefield -> Move 1 damage counter from him to each enemy. Flip this.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your deck can have up to 1 extra Star of Actions and up to 1 extra Star of Upgrades.

property.name: Text
property.value: When your Sky Shadow (Tank) or Sky Shadow (Plane) is KO'd and you have Ominus outside the game -> Combine them into Sky Shadow, Elite Warrior with Ominus in head mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your deck can have up to 2 extra Stars of Secret Actions.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you have Wingspan, Data Processor on the battlefield and an Upgrade is scrapped from one of your characters -> Put that Upgrade under Wingspan.

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per game, when you flip one of your characters that has a character on it in head mode -> You may swap that head with one of your other character's heads. When you do, flip this.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you upgrade Autobot Outback, Gunner -> Draw a card. Then scrap a card from your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: While your Starscream, Decepticon King is upgraded with Decepticon Crown -> He has +4 [HEALTH].

property.name: Text
property.value: If your starting team is only Decepticons -> Your deck can have up to 2 extra Stars of [O] cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your deck can have up to 1 extra Star of Weapons and up to 1 extra Star of Armors.

property.name: Text
property.value: When your Sergeant Kup, Veteran Sergeant is upgraded with a Weapon, an Armor, and a Utility, and he does enough attack damage to KO a defender -> Untap him.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Move an Upgrade from an enemy to another enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Return an Upgrade on an enemy to its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this defends against a Car, Truck, or tank, and you flip at least [B] -> This gets +1 [DEF] until end of battle for each [B] you flipped.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this defends -> You may play an Armor onto her.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> You may scrap an Upgrade from your hand. If you do, draw 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: If an opponent's card would cause an Upgrade to be scrapped from this -> Instead you may scrap an Upgrade of the same type from your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks and you flip at least [B] -> Do 1 damage to each non-defending enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: This can't take more than 5 attack damage from a single Ranged character's attack.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Name a card. Then reveal the top card of your deck. If it's the named card, draw 3 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: When an enemy takes non-attack damage -> It gets -1 [DEF] until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Look at the top card of your deck. If it's an Upgrade, you may play it.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks and you flip at least one Upgrade -> You may put one of the Upgrades you flipped into your hand after the battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks an enemy that has more Stars than him and you flip battle cards -> This gets Pierce 1 until end of battle for each different color among battle icons you flipped.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this defends an enemy that has more Stars than him and you flip battle cards -> This gets +1 [DEF] until end of battle for each different color among battle icons you flipped.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks and your opponent has 3 or more Actions in their KO area -> This gets +3 [ATK] until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Look at your opponent's hand and put an Action from it into their KO area.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks and you have 5 or more cards in hand -> He gets +3 [ATK] until end of battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: This has +2 [ATK] for each face-down or face-up Secret Action you have.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may reveal a Secret Action from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest back on top in any order.

property.name: Text
property.value: While this is your only character on the battledfield -> He has +2 [ATK].

property.name: Text
property.value: When this or another character is KO'd -> Do 1 damage to EACH other character.

property.name: Text
property.value: While this is attacking an enemy that has more Stars than him -> This has Bold 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: While this is defending against an enemy that has fewer Stars than him -> This has Tough 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Move 1 damage counter from this to an enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play a [K] card -> Do 1 damage to an enemy and 1 damage to this.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this defends and you flip at least [O] -> Do 1 damage to the attacker after the battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> This gets +2 [ATK] until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Choose a battle icon color. Then look at your opponent's hand and scrap a card from it that has a battle icon of that color.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks and you flip at least [K] -> Your opponent chooses a card from their hand and scraps it. If they can't, you draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you have a face-down or face-up Secret Action -> Each of your characters has Tough 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you have a face-down or face-up Secret Action -> Each of your characters has Bold 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Draw a card. Then, if you have fewer cards in hand than your opponent, draw another card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks -> Repair 1 damage from one of your characters. Then, if you have fewer characters on the battlefield than your opponent, repair 1 more damage from that character.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you upgrade this with an Armor -> Repair 1 damage from him.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you upgrade this with a Weapon -> Do 1 damage to an enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: Tough 1. When one of your Wreckers takes 1 or more damage during your turn -> It gets that much +Attack until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> You may scrap a [B] card from your hand. If you do, scrap an enemy Upgrade.

property.name: Text
property.value: Whie this is attacking an Autobot -> This has Pierce 3.

property.name: Text
property.value: When an enemy that has fewer Stars than this becomes tapped -> Do 1 damage to that enemy. When an enemy that has more Stars than this becomes tapped -> Do 1 damage to this.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this defends -> He gets Tough until end of battle equal to his Bold total.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks and you flip at least [W] -> Draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> One of your characters gets +1 [ATK] until end of turn. If it shares a trait with this, it gets +2 [ATK] until end of turn instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks -> Do 1 damage to an enemy that isn't a Car or Plane.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> This gets Pierce 3 until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Your opponent chooses one of their characters and does 1 damage to it. If you flipped this character at least 2 times this turn, instead do 1 damage to each enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: This has +3 [ATK] during your first turn of the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Draw a card. Then Plan 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks -> If you had at least 2 Planes on your starting team, move 2 damage counters from this to the defender. Otherwise, move 1 damage counter from this to the defender.

property.name: Text
property.value: When one of your other characters attacks -> You may move 1 damage counter from it to this.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Draw a card. This has +1 [DEF] for each card under him.

property.name: Text
property.value: When an Upgrade is scrapped from this -> Put it under him.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> You may scrap a [G] card from your hand. If you do, draw 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this battles -> Instead of swapping a card from your hand with one of your flipped [G] cards after the battle, you may put one of those [G] cards into your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this defends and you flip at least [W][B] -> Do 1 damage to the attacker. This begins with Cerebros, City Commander on him in head mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks and you flip at least [O][K] -> Do 2 damage to each enemy. Flip this to alt mode after the battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Bold 1, Tough 1. When this battles and you flip at least [W][O][K][B] -> You may play an Upgrade from your scrap pile onto this.

property.name: Text
property.value: This starts the game with a Plane, or Helicopter under it that costs 4 Stars or fewer. When this attacks, combines, or is KO'd -> Deploy the character under it to the battlefield in alt mode. If this is attacking you get an extra attack this turn, but only with the deployed character.

property.name: Text
property.value: This starts the game with a Car, Tank, or Truck under it that costs 4 Stars or fewer. When this attacks, combines, or is KO'd -> Deploy the character under it to the battlefield in alt mode. If this is attacking you get an extra attack this turn, but only with the deployed character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Stealth. When your second character is KO'd this game and you had Tidal Wave, Dark Fleet (Aircraft Carrier) and Tidal Wave, Dark Fleet (Transport) on your starting team -> Combine them with this into Tidal Wave, Dark Fleet.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Your opponent separates those cards into 2 piles. Put 1 pile into your hand and the other under this face down.

property.name: Text
property.value: This has +1 [ATK] for each card under him.

property.name: Text
property.value: Bold 2. Tough 2. When this is combined -> Do 3 damage to an enemy Autobot.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this is combined -> Tap an enemy.
